content.p: The Business Analysis and Reporting Team provide comprehensive analyses of a broad range of data to support evidenced based decision making in relation to RKE performance and metrics. The SDP Delivery Team are responsible for the on-going management of the Research & Knowledge Exchange Strategic Delivery Plans, together with delivery of key initiatives within these plans. Business Analysis and Reporting provide comprehensive analyses of a broad range of data to support evidenced based decision making in relation to RKE performance and metrics. Research & Innovation Internal Funding strategically manage and administer institutional funding schemes to support RKE activity, including the International Research Collaboration Fund (IRCF), UNICAS and the Interdisciplinary Networks Fund (IDF), together with oversight of institutional match funding processes and procedure. They also act as a central source of knowledge and expertise to ensure that researchers can get a full picture of the funding opportunities open to them. Provision of strategic support to enable the institution to maximise its RKE equipment and facilities infrastructure, and for equipment and infrastructure bid development. Strategic support to ensure the institution undertakes and delivers research in ways which foster a productive and inclusive research culture and environment, that fully supports the delivery of excellent research. Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
